trans-unit.source: Stores the fields and properties read by a condition or written to by an action.
The information stored by <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis> is important because it identifies dependencies and side effects of rules in the rule set.
These dependencies and side effects drive the chaining behavior.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.

A `Boolean` value that indicates whether analysis is being done for writes (in the case of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects) or reads (in the case of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> objects).
Adds the fields and properties used by an expression as symbols to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref> instance.

Use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis.AddSymbol%2A> method to add fields and properties used by an expression to the list of symbols for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis> instance.
A string that represents the path to a field or property.
Gets a value that indicates whether analysis is being done for writes or reads.

`true` if analysis is being done for writes (in the case of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects); otherwise, `false` if the analysis is being done for reads (in the case of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> objects).
Returns the list of symbols from the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref> instance.
The list of symbols for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref> instance.
